TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定实现时表示安全令牌参数的 类。

span.span: Specifies an class that when implemented represents security token parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌参数提供安全绑定元素所需的有关令牌的信息（例如，令牌类型、颁发者等）。Security token parameters provide information about the tokens (for example, token type, issuer, and so on) required by the security binding element. 从该安全令牌参数派生的安全令牌参数类是令牌属性和方法的集合，并且可用于创建各种不同的安全绑定元素和令牌。The security token parameter classes derived from this one are a collection of token properties and methods, and are used in creating different kinds of security binding elements and tokens. 并非所有的属性都与所有的派生类相关。Not all of the properties are relevant to all derived classes. 例如，在令牌（SAML 令牌）已颁发的情况下， 就没有相关性。For example, the has no relevance in an issued token (SAML token) case. ## Examples 下面的代码演示了此类的自定义重写，它称为 *CreditCardTokenParameters*。The following code shows a custom override of this class called *CreditCardTokenParameters*. [!code-csharp[c_CustomToken#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customtoken/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[c_CustomToken#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customtoken/vb/source.vb#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

value.span: 如果该令牌具有非对称密钥，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the token has an asymmetric key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非对称密钥用于公钥加密，公钥加密使用两个密钥，即在数学上相关的一个公钥和一个私钥。Asymmetric keys are used in public-key cryptography, which uses two keys, a public key and a private key, which are related mathematically. 公钥可广泛分发，私钥则保密。The public key is distributed widely, but the private key is kept secret. 在公钥加密中，无需交换公共密钥。In public-key cryptography, there is no need to exchange a common key.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, initializes a security token requirement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在输入到安全令牌管理器的同时提供令牌需求，以获取安全令牌提供程序或令牌的安全令牌身份验证器。The token requirement is provided as input to the security token manager to obtain a security token provider or security token authenticator for the token.

summary.span: 获取或设置令牌的引用样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the token reference style.
The reference style for the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 令牌引用样式指定如何在 SOAP 消息中引用令牌。The token reference style specifies how to refer to the token in the SOAP message. 此属性返回的枚举成员设置了所需的引用样式，该样式用于在消息中从签名和加密元素生成安全令牌的安全令牌引用 (STR)。This property returns a member of an enumeration that sets the desired referencing style that is used to generate security token references (STR) to the security tokens from the signature and encryption elements in the message.

exception.span: 设置的令牌引用样式无效。

span.span: An invalid token reference style was .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以从原始校验密钥中派生密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether keys can be derived from the original proof keys.

value.span: 如果需要从令牌的密钥中派生密钥，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if keys need to be derived from the token's key; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用令牌执行签名和加密时，WCF 需要从令牌的密钥中派生密钥。WCF needs to derive keys from the token's key when performing signature and encryption using the token. 派生密钥在具有共享安全上下文的安全对话中生成，这样对话中的所有消息均可应用相同的安全性。Derived keys originate in Secure Conversations where there is a shared security context so that the same security can be applied across all messages in the conversation. 安全上下文令牌包含共享的秘密，可用于消息签名和加密。A security context token involves a shared secret, which is used for message signing and encryption. 共享秘密用于创建派生密钥。The shared secret is used to create derived keys. 要在长时间的对话中保持高级别的安全性，可定期创建新的派生密钥。To maintain a high level of security through a lengthy conversation, new derived keys can be created periodically.
